record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - December 10, 2008)

[Page: H10944]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days to revise and extend their remarks and to include extraneous material on the bill that was just passed by the House.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from California?
